mapper.insert: insert into member (userid, passwd, userName, nickName, address, addressDetail, interArea, email, phone) values (#{userid}, #{passwd}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{address}, #{addressdetail}, #{interarea}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update member set passwd = #{passwd}, userName = #{username}, nickName = #{nickname}, address = #{address}, addressDetail = #{addressdetail}, interArea = #{interarea}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone} where userid = #{userid}
